snippet: The Palestinian Authority accused Israel of deliberately delaying the treatment of the prisoner, a retired general who had throat cancer.
abstract: Hundreds of Palestinian prisoners stage protests in Israeli jails as Palestinian leadership accuses Israel of deliberately delaying treatment of Maysara Abu Hamdiya, prisoner and retired general in the Palestinian Authority security services who died of throat cancer.

byline.contributor: Nayef Hashlamoun contributed reporting from Hebron, West Bank.

lead_paragraph: The Palestinian Authority accused Israel of deliberately delaying the treatment of the prisoner, a retired general who had throat cancer.

headline.seo: Palestinian Prisoners in Israel Protest After Inmate Dies
headline.main: Palestinians Jailed in Israel Protest After Inmate Dies
headline.print_headline: Palestinians Jailed in Israel Protest After Inmate Dies
